resources.string: The SUTD Library is an open access technology and design library. Its unique design supports our pedagogy and offers a truly sensory experience from discovery through serendipity to a touch and feel with spaces to read, research and reflect.
Enjoy freshly made, handcrafted sandwiches at this newly sprouted caf√©.

The SUTD-MIT International Design Centre is a leading global hub for innovation-ready design research, science and practice. It addresses the societal and ecological challenges of today and turn them into business opportunities and growth engines of tomorrow.
